name: Shield of the Steed
flavorText: "My master used to claim a flail and a horse are all that is needed to see the crusade to its conclusion. I'd bring along a shield as well, just to be safe." -Norvald the Crusader
flavorTextHtml: "My master used to claim a flail and a horse are all that is needed to see the crusade to its conclusion. I'd bring along a shield as well, just to be safe." -Norvald the Crusader

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Increases the duration of Steed Charge by 2 seconds. In addition, killing an enemy reduces the cooldown of Steed Charge by 1 second.    
 Gain 400% increased damage while using Steed Charge and for 5 seconds after it ends.
